author: Doha Madani
title: Ohio man who disparaged lockdown measures on Facebook dies of coronavirus
description: His alleged posts have gone viral amid protests and debates about the loosening of social distancing measures across the country.
content:
Social media posts of an Ohio man who disparaged coronavirus lockdown measures are now circulating online after he died of COVID-19, the disease associated with coronavirus.
Screenshots of Facebook posts calling social distancing measures bullshit have surfa… [+2745 chars]
